data.lyric:
[ti:Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas]
[ar:Michael Bublé]
[al:Christmas (Deluxe 10th Anniversary Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas - Michael Bublé (麦可·布雷)
[00:09.60]Lyrics by：Hugh Martin/Ralph Blane
[00:19.21]Have yourself a merry little Christmas
[00:26.57]
[00:28.11]Let your heart be light
[00:33.30]
[00:35.60]From now on
[00:37.74]
[00:38.26]Our troubles will be out of sight
[00:46.13]
[00:51.70]Have yourself a merry little Christmas
[00:57.05]
[00:59.26]Make the Yuletide gay
[01:02.52]
[01:05.19]From now on
[01:07.24]Our troubles will be miles away
[01:15.08]
[01:17.46]Here we are as in olden days
[01:24.03]
[01:24.74]Happy golden days of yore
[01:30.70]
[01:33.48]Faithful friends who are dear to us
[01:37.70]
[01:38.78]Gather near to us once more
[01:45.14]
[01:47.34]Through the years
[01:49.16]
[01:50.03]We all will be together
[01:52.50]
[01:54.94]If the fates allow
[01:58.95]
[02:00.66]Hang a shining star upon the highest bough
[02:12.24]
[02:13.62]And have yourself a merry little Christmas now
[02:23.49]
[02:40.61]Faithful friends who are dear to us
[02:46.43]
[02:47.79]Gather near to us once more
[02:52.71]
[02:56.27]Through the years
[02:58.23]
[02:58.85]We all will be together
[03:01.59]
[03:02.79]If the fates allow
[03:07.49]So hang a shining star upon the highest bough
[03:21.45]
[03:22.60]And have yourself a merry little Christmas now
